title: Now With Feeling by The Cowboys
lyrics:
And if you got a cork up in your ears
I got something that you need to hear
And it's to make myself clear
You'd be something up a gun

You want a girl
But the girl don't want you
Because you send her away to the jail

You need to look real dig besides yourself
But I'm not sure you will

You got one more chance to make this right
A dance all through the gentle night
Now with feeling
Nobody move, nobody can't touch, is nobody really away?

(?)
